name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of the task]"
labels: maintenance
assignees: ""

---

## Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

## Scope of Work
Detail what work needs to be done (e.g., dependency updates, code refactoring, documentation cleanup).

## Expected Outcome
What will be the result of completing this maintenance task?

## Additional Notes
Add any other context or notes about the maintenance task here.
